text: @JoeBiden So wait, you are saying under you the virus would have affected people differently? I am so sick and fucking tired of you people pinning the virus on President @realDonaldTrump. The economy was HIGHEST EVER before COVID19 made it here. What did YOU do to stop it? Huh, smartass?
